about_the_game:
FAE POPULI tells the tragic tales of many FAE, and beings alike. Tiny creatures who exist in an enchanted nightmare--the beautiful, yet dangerous world of GAEA.

FAE POPULI is a gift from me to my kid self, even if she will never be able to play it.
detailed_description:
FAE POPULI tells the tragic tales of many FAE, and beings alike. Tiny creatures who exist in an enchanted nightmare--the beautiful, yet dangerous world of GAEA.

FAE POPULI is a gift from me to my kid self, even if she will never be able to play it.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: FAE POPULI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Once upon a time, a lonely FAE was given the role of the Messiah. FAE POPULI tells the story of the many colorful creatures Hanah, the Messiah, meets in her journey towards saving the world of GAEA.
